firms.name: Striker Venture Partners
firms.notes: Founding team includes former CRV principals, targeting $30M seed checks, backed Skild AI, Dyna Robotics, Periodic Labs, Reflection AI

partners.name: Brian Zhan
partners.notes: Former Principal @ CRV, Forbes 30 Under 30 (VC), Northwestern CS, former engineer @ Facebook, sister is Stephanie Zhan (Sequoia GP)

firms.name: Z Fellows
firms.notes: One-week accelerator giving $10K grants at $1B cap, backed early-stage founders

partners.name: Cory Levy
partners.notes: Forbes 30 Under 30, founded After School (20M users, raised $1M at age 19), interned at Founders Fund & USV in high school, University of Illinois CS

firms.name: Maxq Fund
firms.notes: Founded 2024, targeting $250M fund, focus on AI and growth-stage companies

partners.name: Ali Rowghani
partners.notes: Former Managing Partner @ YC Continuity (2014-2023), former COO & CFO @ Twitter (2008-2014), former CFO @ Pixar (2002-2008), Stanford BA & MBA, board member at Deel, PostHog, Pave

firms.name: Juniper Ventures
firms.notes: Focus on AI safety/assurance startups, sweet spot $500K checks, backed by Reid Hoffman, Eric Ries, Jan Leike, Woj Zaremba, Geoff Ralston, publishes AI Assurance Technology Report

partners.name: Nick Fitz
partners.notes: Also Founder & CEO @ Momentum (since 2018), portfolio includes Goodfire, Haize Labs

firms.name: Y Combinator
firms.notes: World's most prestigious startup accelerator, $500K standard deal, backed Airbnb, Stripe, Coinbase, OpenAI, Instacart

partners.name: Garry Tan
partners.notes: Former partner at Initialized Capital, co-founder of Posterous, YC alum (W08)

partners.name: Jared Friedman
partners.notes: Co-founder of Scribd, YC partner since 2015

partners.name: Diana Hu
partners.notes: Former Visiting Partner, leads AI/ML investments

partners.name: Dalton Caldwell
partners.notes: Co-founder of App.net and imeem, YC partner since 2013

firms.name: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z)
firms.notes: One of the largest VC firms, known for full-stack approach with operating teams, major AI investments include Anthropic, Mistral, Character.AI

partners.name: Marc Andreessen
partners.notes: Co-creator of Mosaic browser, co-founder of Netscape, board member at Meta

partners.name: Ben Horowitz
partners.notes: Former CEO of Opsware (sold to HP for $1.6B), author of 'The Hard Thing About Hard Things'

partners.name: Martin Casado
partners.notes: Co-founder of Nicira (acquired by VMware for $1.26B), leads enterprise/infrastructure investments

partners.name: Anjney Midha
partners.notes: Leads AI investments, former founder, board member at Mistral AI

firms.name: Sequoia Capital
firms.notes: One of the most successful VC firms, backed Apple, Google, WhatsApp, Stripe, early OpenAI investor

partners.name: Roelof Botha
partners.notes: Former CFO of PayPal, led investments in YouTube, Instagram, MongoDB

partners.name: Stephanie Zhan
partners.notes: Leads AI/ML investments, former Google PM, sister of Brian Zhan (Striker VC)

partners.name: Konstantine Buhler
partners.notes: Leads AI investments, former founder, board member at Harvey AI

firms.name: Founders Fund
firms.notes: Founded by Peter Thiel, known for contrarian bets, backed SpaceX, Palantir, Stripe, Anduril

partners.name: Peter Thiel
partners.notes: Co-founder of PayPal and Palantir, first outside investor in Facebook

partners.name: Keith Rabois
partners.notes: Former COO of Square, executive at PayPal/LinkedIn/Opendoor
